scripts.start:patient-frontend: cd patient-panel && cross-env BROWSER=none npm start
scripts.medico: concurrently -n login-backend,root-login,doctor,admin,patient-frontend,patient-backend -c yellow,green,blue,magenta,cyan,red "npm run start:login-backend" "npm run start:root-login" "npm run start:doctor" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:patient-frontend" "npm run start:patient-backend"
